Name: Drunk ride
About the game: DRUNK RIDE is a fun motorcycle racing arcade game with a top view, with its bright and colorful world. You have to go on your iron horse to meet the speed and drive ... In DRUNK RIDE, the task is not only to overcome all obstacles and jumps, but in addition you have to drive a motorcycle while intoxicated? To the fervent music, have time to click the mouse at the right time to turn and jump, the game becomes more complicated and faster with each level, during the race control complicates alcohol, you begin to feel dizzy and disoriented, but you need to go and try not to get killed.
